name: Lionel: Raiders of the Lost Chessboard
overview: The City of Eilyk has risen into a state of panic. The Lost Chessboard of Eugonim has been stolen from its sacred hiding place. And the world as we know it is under threat. The Euil Innad has claimed responsibility for the dastardly deed and has demanded that the tood people of Eilyk surrender to their demands. He give everyone the same challenge. If you can pass the 50 mazes of his lair The Chessboard will be returned.
